Class BhattAdaptationFullSiteMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • teaspoon.app.utils.BhattAdaptationFullSiteMatrix

  • public class BhattAdaptationFullSiteMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
    TEASPOON: Tools for Evolutionary Analysis of Serially-sampled POpulatiONs Jayna Raghwani, Samir Bhatt, Joe Parker & Oliver G. Pybus University of Oxford, 2010-2018. The 'full' site matrix contains all positions in an input main- or ancestral-file
    Since:
    7 Jun 2018
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    @lonelyjoeparker
